name: SANKET-Leads to a Change within US

address: Care of Anita Mahapatra, Motibagan, Chinsurah, Hooghly

briefDescription: The organization intends to work with the children from underprivileged families of the society focusing on their behavioral change by promoting awareness on basic hygiene practices, awareness on importance of education and by helping children bringing positive changes in their lifestyle which basically lead to an inclusive development and thus making the way broader for the development of community.SANKET has reached more than 100 children in a span of 16 months.

address: Care of Anita Mahatra, Motibagan, Chinsurah, Hooghly
